skip; filter; sift: To be begun, to have started
therapeutic walk in the forest; getting some fresh air
to disregard, to neglect; to treat in a disrepectful manner
to put emphasis on; to stress, attach importance to
at last, in the end, after all
to be just as good as
to publish, bring out in print
be rampant, be prevalent, be endemic
to pretend to help someone after hurting them
bitter pills may have blessed effects
